name: Stalingrad (itch)
description:
This game is my take on the battle of Stalingrad, (very) loosely inspired by Jean-Jacques Annaud's movie . It was made for the game jam "Make something horrible 2019", hence the short development time and rather lousy graphics... Nevertheless, I hope that you will enjoy it.

There are a few historical inaccuracies, which I'll discuss in a log entry. By the way, I don't speak good Russian so I had to use an automatic translation often times - I hope I didn't let too many mistakes slip in. If the English translation sucks its all my fault though.

Edit 2019-09-22 : version 1.1 is now (a little) less difficult.
